There is an Exclusive Dispensary for everyone. GET DIRECTIONS Find Nearby Service Providers Use my location to find the closest Service Provider near me View Description JOIN OUR VIP MAILING LIST Get access to exclusive rewards, discounts, promotions and more exclusive news! FOLLOW EXCLUSIVE Michigan CANNABIS DISPENSARIES At Exclusive, you come first. Our Michigan marijuana dispensaries provide a safe, welcoming environment for you to explore the world of cannabis. With exclusive products you won’t find anywhere else and educated budtenders ready to guide you through your journey, our dispensaries provide the shopping experience you deserve. Exclusive’s Michigan marijuana dispensaries offer unique, high-quality products, many of which we’ve created and produced ourselves! As a vertically-integrated operation, we control every step of the process—from seed to sale. When you shop Exclusive’s popular products, you know that you’re buying meticulously grown and produced cannabis products that have been lab-tested for safety and approved for your use. Whether you are looking to use cannabis for the first time or an expert in all things marijuana, we have the flower, vape cartridges, concentrates, edibles, and topicals for you to craft the experience you want. WHY CHOOSE EXCLUSIVE? ONE OF A KIND We offer exclusive products that you won’t find anywhere else. Enjoy the best that Michigan has to offer with Concentrate Kings, Strain Kings, Terpene Tanks, and Magic Edibles. HIGH QUALITY Our customers deserve the best, so we make sure that all the products that we stock are of the highest caliber. FRIENDLY Our knowledgeable team is ready to help you find the products that will work best for you. Our staff will offer recommendations so you can have the best experience possible. FUN Whether we’re shooting a video or just chatting with a customer, we love to have fun and infuse that energy into everything we do. SAFE Not only are all of our products lab-tested for safety, but we also offer the largest selection of top cannabis brands and a variety of shopping methods so you can choose the one that’s right for you. Take advantage of our online ordering, curbside service, and premium service for medical cardholders.
